column1: Rowans were Trees of the genus Sorbus
column2: also called mountain ash. Found especially on the slopes of Mountains and hills
column3: these trees with their unmistakable red berries once grew in the western Fangorn Forest
column4: in the regions close to Isengard.

column2: Orofarnë and Lassemista were individual rowan-trees of Fangorn.
